metadata.Title: CVE-2018-14645 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
A flaw was discovered in the HPACK decoder of HAProxy, before 1.8.14, that is used for HTTP/2. An out-of-bounds read access in hpack_valid_idx() resulted in a remote crash and denial of service.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-14645` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

haproxy - 1.8.8-1ubuntu0.2
vim-haproxy - 1.8.8-1ubuntu0.2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: haproxy package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.8.8-1ubuntu0.2').
